Calculators

This is a test of simple calculations in html using forms. These are largely replicates of some of the convenience calculators found here.

Simply enter a new value in one of the forms and press ENTER or click outside the box to update the values.

β-NQR spectrometer magnet current to field converter

ILE2A1:HH
H (G) = a (G) + b (G/A) × I (A)
Current setpoint [I] (A):
Magnetic field [H] (G):

The calibration constants are: a = 0.175 ± 0.046 G and b = 2.2131 ± 0.0019 G/A.

β-NMR antenna pickup to RF field converter

H1 field
H1 (G) = 39.6 (G MHz/V) × Vp-p (V) / f (MHz)
Antenna pickup [Vp-p] (V):
RF frequency [f] (MHz): 41.27

The above expression is accurate to ± 3 %.
